description: Ready in 15 minutes, this custard tart recipe couldnâ€™t be easier. Top them with fruit or your favourite spices, like cinnamon and ginger.
name: Custard Tart Hack Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180 degrees. Open packet of tartlet cases and place on oven tray leave them in their foil trays.
Add custard into each shortcrust tartlet case. Sprinkle cinnamon and cinnamon sugar on top. Bake in oven for ten minutes.
Turn oven off and take custard tarts out of baking tray. Place carefully place on a plate. The custard will look a little bit watery.
Place plate with the 6 tarts on the plate in freezer and freeze for 1 to 2 hours to allow the custard to set. Take out of the freezer and refrigerate until you are ready to eat.
